role_description: An Ansible role that installs MAS CLI, which is a CLI for the Mac App Store, on macOS
role_description_full_overview: [MAS CLI](https://github.com/mas-cli/mas) is a simple command line interface for the Mac App Store. Designed for scripting and automation.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs MAS CLI, which is a CLI for the Mac App Store, on macOS.
